meanings.definition: A ladder with steps or rungs for ascending or descending.
meanings.sent1: The workers used stepladders to reach the high shelves in the warehouse.
meanings.sent2: I keep a stepladder in the garage for changing light bulbs.
meanings.sent3: The stepladders decided to have a race to see who could reach the top first.
meanings.sent4: Her ambition was like a set of stepladders, helping her climb the corporate ladder.
meanings.sent5: The colorful stepladders stood out against the plain wall.

meanings.definition: A portable ladder with flat steps or rungs.
meanings.sent1: My dad always carries a stepladder in his truck for emergencies.
meanings.sent2: The maintenance crew brought a stepladder to fix the broken light fixture.
meanings.sent3: The stepladders were tired of being moved around all the time.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a stepladder, helping her rise above her doubts.
meanings.sent5: The old stepladder creaked under his weight as he climbed up.
